interestingcomments.content:
Sudden failure of Canon connect app (iOS) /!/ Canon RP/iPhone 12 Pro/latest firmware on both devices. Full delete, reinstall, restart, battery pull, re-initialize—full 9 yards. Did a fresh clean sweep.

The app says failed to pair. The phone definitely communicates with the camera cause as soon as I press “pairing” on the RP, the camera pops up on the phone app as available to select. I select it then immediately fails to pair. 

So i’m thinking the app is to blame. I just used it fine the other day and fairly frequently before that. 

Anyone else having connection issues? i doubt this has anything to do with it but i’ll throw it out there—I am running iOS 14.4 beta but as i said i’ve been using the app just fine multiple times up until today. (have had iOS 14 beta for a long time now) 

Last used the Canon app to transfer photos successfully yesterday actually.
